headline: US Rig Count Remains Steady: Should You Watch EOG & MTDR Stocks?
summary: It would be wise to focus on EOG & MTDR stocks, as the crude price is favorable with BKR's weekly rig count report stating that the tally is in line.

headline: EOG Resources price target raised to $140 from $137 at Barclays
summary: Barclays raised the firm’s price target on EOG Resources (EOG) to $140 from $137 and keeps an Equal Weight rating on the shares. EOG delivered “another strong quarter all around” and the bigger positive is the new stance on optimal capital structure which suggests capacity to return 100% or more of free cash flow at least in the near-to-medium term, the analyst tells investors in a research note. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking financial news
